Class Summary
CharUtils

English  
FastDateFormat FastDateFormat is a fast and thread-safe version of SimpleDateFormat.
RandomStringUtils Operations for random Strings.
StopWatch StopWatch provides a convenient API for timings.

Validate This class assists in validating arguments.
WordUtils Operations on Strings that contain words.
